name: Adventure Pirates FREE
description:
Fly, dodge and shoot your way through the skies in this pirate adventure! Collect treasure on the way to unlock new characters to play with. Play as different characters! Collect powerups to destroy all your enemies at once or collect all the treasure.

Endless gameplay with new characters to play once you collect a certain amount of coins! New locations with each update!

Players will have to battle the enemies of the sky in this fast paced adventure! Harrrdy harrr!
